name: guilde-plugins
description: Workflow automation, TDD, code review, and development tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: conductor-workflows
plugins.description: Slash commands for orchestrating multi-phase implementation workflows using the conductor pattern

plugins.name: tdd-automation
plugins.description: Test-driven development workflow with red/green/refactor phases and coverage monitoring

plugins.name: multi-agent-review
plugins.description: Parallel code review agents for comprehensive quality assurance

plugins.name: exploration-agents
plugins.description: Codebase exploration and analysis agents for understanding unfamiliar code

plugins.name: implementation-agents
plugins.description: Development agents for backend, frontend, database, and test automation

plugins.name: spec-agents
plugins.description: Specification building agent for creating detailed specs and acceptance criteria

plugins.name: mise-tools
plugins.description: Mise-first development environment management with version control

plugins.name: context-preservation
plugins.description: Session state management and error recovery for long-running workflows

plugins.name: diagram-generation
plugins.description: Mermaid and C4 diagram generation for architecture visualization

plugins.name: code-review-pipeline
plugins.description: Multi-stage code review workflow with parallel agent reviews

plugins.name: release-research
plugins.description: Release notes and changelog research for tracking upstream updates

plugins.name: docs-sync
plugins.description: Documentation synchronization to keep docs aligned with code

plugins.name: jj-tools
plugins.description: Jujutsu (jj) version control commands and workflow guidance

plugins.name: agentic-flow
plugins.description: AI agent coordination with QuantumDAG, AgentDB learning, and quantum-resistant signing

plugins.name: microsoft-agents
plugins.description: Microsoft Agent Framework for building AI agents with Python SDK
